projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: A JavaScript-based chatbot designed to help kids find activities based on the weather and their energy level. It dynamically adjusts the chat's color scheme according to the user's favorite color, creating a personalized and interactive experience.

projects.name: Mood Melody
projects.description: Mood Melody is a web app that analyzes your mood and suggests music based on how you're feeling. Built with React and MongoDB, it uses OpenAI and Spotify APIs for mood analysis and playback, while also featuring a social feed where users can share journal entries, interact, and connect. With authentication, user search, genre/mood filters, and a dark mode toggle, it offers a personalized and interactive way to experience music.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: A dynamic to-do list app with task categories, light/dark mode, progress tracking, and local storage for persistent task management. It features an English/Swedish language toggle, a clean UI designed with Tailwind CSS, and optimized state management using Zustand.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: The weather app retrieves real-time weather data from a weather API and displays the current temperature and 5-day forecast for a default city. Additional features allow users to cycle through various cities with a button click and offers a search bar to find weather information for any specified city.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: The music releases app features a structured component hierarchy, responsive layouts, hover effects, and external linking for albums and artists, with a focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Movie Site Project
projects.description: This is an interactive movie guide built with React Router and the TMDb API. It allows users to browse movie categories and discover detailed information about a selected film. Designed with a focus on responsiveness and accessibility, it also includes error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists for a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: This project allows users to post happy thoughts, view the most recent posts, and like posts by clicking a button. It uses the useEffect hook to handle side effects such as fetching recent posts from an API and updating the time since each thought was posted in real time.

projects.name: Album Library
projects.description: This project is a digital library built using an array of data collections. It includes features for filtering, sorting, and random selection of items. The page is responsive, adapting well to mobile, tablet, and desktop views.

projects.name: The Royal Swedes
projects.description: A redesigned website for a cover band featuring a review submission form, a video loop background, and a CSS-animated spinning crown logo to create an engaging and dynamic user experience.

projects.name: Project A11y
projects.description: An accessibility-focused web project showcasing the harpejji, featuring semantic HTML, ARIA roles, and keyboard navigation to ensure an inclusive user experience, including those with visual impairments.
